div.head: 傷寒陰證
div.div: harm caused by cold with signs in the yin sec tion

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: harm caused by cold with signs in the yin sec tion

sense.def: Alternative Names yin zheng shang han 陰證傷寒 . Pathological Condition of shang han 傷寒 , harm caused by cold, with a weakness of yang qi and an abundance of yin qi. Sheng ji zong lu 聖濟總錄 185: 治傷寒陰證，脈候沉細，正元湯方 , “To cure harm caused by cold with signs in the yin section and when the movement in the vessels is deep inside and fine: [use] the recipe for the ‘decoction to rectify the original [qi] ’”.
